photo.description: Sell your soul. Sell your reason. Sell your emotions Because all are an impossible luxury. An invaluable jewel from Place Vendôme Vends ton âme. Vends ta raison. Vends tes émotions. Ici tout cela est un luxe Un impayable bijou De la Place Vendôme Place Vendôme, Paris
photo.tags: paris france place vendome colonne column architecture napoleon art luxe luxury dior ritz palace lamp street dark lampadaire people clouds sky nuages cinematic cinema wide large widescreen canon eos 500d raw lightroom gilderic europe city ville capitale trip travel summer urban
photo.title: Urban Mythologies : Vendome

photo.description: Stereographic projection of this equirectangular panorama. Part of my Wee planets set.

photo.title: Place Vendôme

photo.description: Equirectangular panorama built from 33 pictures (EXIF data from the first one). See also its stereographic projection. The blue color of the column is not me messing up the white balance : it is lighted this way. Also the large limo is not a stitch error :) Interactive view.
